meanings.sent1: The cake had a sugary frosting.
meanings.sent2: The sugary candy melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent3: Her sugary smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent4: The sugary sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The sugary scent of freshly baked cookies filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent2: I love the sugary flavor of cotton candy.
meanings.sent3: Grandma's sugary cookies always make me smile.
meanings.sent4: The sugary tea warmed my heart on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The sugary ice cream was a treat on a hot summer afternoon.

meanings.sent1: The movie's sugary ending made everyone cry.
meanings.sent2: Her sugary words of love made him feel special.
meanings.sent3: The sugary love letter was both touching and funny.
meanings.sent4: The sugary romance novel was a guilty pleasure.
meanings.sent5: His sugary compliments were always appreciated by his friends.
